content:
{"name": "Midtown Assistance Center - Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Client choice food pantry - volunteers pack up based on requests
* Services provided by appointment only - no walk-ins
* Residents of 10 zip codes in Atlanta - 30303, 08, 09 ,10 ,12, 13, 14, 15, 18 and 63
* ID and Proof of address required (current lease, utility bill, hotel or room receipt)

These are the details on making requests – an online option and a phone option

https://www.tfaforms.com/4814925 or visit https://midtownassistancecenter.org/request-help/ and click on the Orange button Request Non-Financial Help

If you are unable to complete an online form, please call our office in the mornings – Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday from 10AM – 12PM at 404-681-5777 to be screened





", "email": "", "url": "https://midtownassistancecenter.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "613 Spring Street Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Midtown Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30308", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7715067, "longitude": -84.3886876}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 681-5777", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
